header.title: MCBEPackCrypt
header.subtitle: Minecraft Bedrock Resource Pack Encryption Tool

home.description: Protect your Minecraft Bedrock resource pack creations from unauthorized use and distribution. Choose a feature below to get started.

encrypt.title: Resource Pack Encryption
encrypt.description: Protect your Minecraft Bedrock resource packs from unauthorized use and distribution.

modal.title: Encrypt Resource Pack
modal.dragText: Click or drag files to this area to upload
modal.hint: Support .zip and .mcpack format resource pack files

validation.required: Please select a file to encrypt
validation.unsupported: Unsupported file format, only {{formats}} formats are supported

result.description: Your file has been successfully encrypted. Please click the buttons below to download the files.
result.warning: ⚠️ Please keep the key file safe. You cannot decrypt without it!

decrypt.title: Resource Pack Decryption
decrypt.description: Use the correct key file to decrypt encrypted resource packs and restore original files.

modal.title: Decrypt Resource Pack
modal.encryptedHint: Drag or click to upload .zip format encrypted file
modal.keyHint: Drag or click to upload .key format key file
modal.preserveContents: Preserve contents.json file (for debugging or analyzing encryption structure)

validation.encryptedRequired: Please select an encrypted resource pack file
validation.bothRequired: Please select both encrypted file and key file
validation.encryptedFormat: Encrypted file must be in .zip format
validation.keyFormat: Key file must be in .key format

result.description: Your file has been successfully decrypted. Please click the button below to download the file.

result.encryptMessage: Your file has been successfully encrypted. Please click the buttons below to download the files.
result.decryptMessage: Your file has been successfully decrypted. Please click the button below to download the file.
result.keyWarning: Please keep the key file safe. You cannot decrypt without it!
result.decryptComplete: File has been successfully decrypted and is ready to use

downloadTask.title: Download Task Reminder
downloadTask.pendingTitle: You have an unfinished download task
downloadTask.pendingMessage: We detected that you have an unfinished download task. Please choose whether to continue the download.

errorModal.title: Resource Pack Processing Error
errorModal.message: An exception occurred while processing the resource pack, unable to complete the current operation.

suggestions.title: Suggested Solutions:
suggestions.copyStack: Copy the stack trace content and seek help from AI tools, technical communities, etc. to troubleshoot the issue
suggestions.submitIssue: If the problem persists, you can organize the stack trace information and submit an Issue, we will assist in handling it

errorModal.note: (Note: Please copy the complete error stack below, not a screenshot of this window, for more accurate problem diagnosis)

localCompute.title: Local Computation Notice
localCompute.computationDescription: All encryption and decryption computations of this tool will be completed on your local device, which means:
localCompute.localPower: Local Computing Power: The encryption process will use your device's CPU for computation
localCompute.filesStayLocal: Files Stay Local: Your files will not be uploaded to any server
localCompute.completePrivacy: Complete Privacy Protection: We cannot access, view, or store any of your file data
localCompute.performanceDescription: When processing larger files, you may notice:
localCompute.normalBehavior: These are all normal phenomena, indicating that your device is securely processing encryption tasks.
localCompute.browserProcessing: All files are processed only in your browser
localCompute.keyGeneration: Encryption keys are generated and retained by your device
localCompute.noAccess: We have no way to access your original files
localCompute.noCloudRecord: No cloud records are left after processing is complete
localCompute.tip: Tip: Keep the browser tab active during processing for optimal performance
